"Final Battle: The Space-Time Rift":
"Each time you clear \"Final Battle: The Space-Time Rift\" by reaching the maximum available depth, a new level of depth becomes available on your next attempt.

The deeper you go, the more powerful the [Primordial Darkness] will be when it appears.

Additional rewards are given each time you reach your current maximum depth."

"The [Primordial Darkness] that appears in this area is an extremely powerful and dangerous enemy.

Because suppressing it requires a great deal of power, each player has a limit on how often they can clear this quest.

You may only clear the quest up to twice each day. The number of clears you have remaining resets at 20:00 every day."

"In this quest, when you are defeated, you will not fail the quest immediately, giving you a chance to use a Half Doll or a Scape Doll.

Note that the quest will be failed if you return to the Campship."
